front.title: RTCP Extended Report for ECN Marked Packets

abstract.t: This document describes a Real-Time Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR) containing information derived from the reception of Explicit Congestion Notification (ECN) marked packets. This document is symbiotic with the approach described in [rtp-ecn], which presents one approach in establishing end-to-end ECN support for real-time sessions.
